amendment.description: Amendment postpones the lifting of sanctions against Serbia and Montenegro until the President certifies to Congress that there is substantial progress toward the realization of a separate identity for Kosova and the right of the people of Kosova to self-determination, and that international human rights observers are allowed to return to Kosova.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 1 in House Rept. 104-167, to postpone the lifting sanctions against Serbia and Montenegro until the President first submits to Congress certification that there is substantial progress toward the realization of a separate identity for Kosova and the right of the people of Kosova to self-determination, and that international human rights observers are allowed to return to Kosova.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
